name: Palasik
description:
Palasik is based on a Malaysian ghost story I used to grow up with. It's about a ghost who wants to maintain her youth and beauty, but the only way to do it is she has to become a blood-sucking, baby-eater monster.  You can say that it's the Asian version of a vampire.

It is a relatively easy detective game that you can solve in minutes. I wanted the game to embody the cheesy 90s movie posters I used to have a love-hate relationship with.
